ygData.subject: Lambent Stones
ygData.msgSnippet: Lambent Stones are LORE, they can be traded though.  They are NOT no drop. they are the only items (minus the gems, of course) that are NOT no drop. A
ygData.messageBody:
Lambent Stones are LORE, they can be traded though. They are NOT no drop.
they are the only items (minus the gems, of course) that are NOT no drop.
A barbarian shaman was giving them away in NK last night on Prexus whenever he
pulled one. They are not rare either. Just the EQ funky random # generator
playing tricks on some people.

Kaleid
20th Song
Prexus
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
--he who continually gets VERY confused looks from passing bards when they
witness him Dual Wielding a Mithril Quill and Water Crystal Staff (DD in range slot)

=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
